1.text: Choose well-draining soil or potting medium.

2.text: Provide moderate to deep shade or indirect light.

3.text: Maintain moderate and consistent temperature and humidity.

4.text: Water your spider plant with distilled or purified water.

5.text: Keep the soil moist but not soggy.

6.text: Fertilize spider plants 1 to 2 times per month during the spring and summer.

7.text: Transplant your spider plant when it outgrows its container.

9.text: Trim dead leaf tips or leaves with scissors.

10.text: Treat spider mites with natural insecticides.

11.text: Heal blanched leaves by reducing sun exposure.
